name: Validate e-mail addresses by MailerCheck and create new customers in Shopify for new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheet, Make will automatically validate the email address by MailerCheck and create new customer in Shopify. The example uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fv2rIpK2JastD7Npy6mrFepUwXHf9HlhcMvnybbP8kY/edit?usp=sharing).
